name: COMM_PREFERENCES_APRV
description: This table extracts the related multiple response item OYO-104, which contains the media approved for use by a person for a given communication concept.

columns.name: PREFERENCES_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the preference record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: APRV_MEDIA_C_NAME
columns.description: The approved communication media for a communication concept.
